author: ANDREW DRAKE
title: 'I don't want to die': Ukrainians fear as invasion closes in
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Yurii Zhyhanov woke before dawn to his mother’s screaming and found himself covered in dust. On the second day of Russia's invasion, shelling on the outskirts of Ukraine’s capital, Kyiv, struck their residential building.
